text: Hamai taomhoi pok qaʙl az nozil şudani Tavrot ʙaroi ʙani Isroil halol ʙud, ʙa çuz cizhoe andake, ki Ja'quʙ (alajhissalom ʙa saʙaʙi ʙemoriaş) ʙaroi xud harom karda ʙud. Vale Alloh ʙa saʙaʙi sitamkorii ʙani Isroil ʙa'ze ta'omhoero, ki ʙaroi onon halol ʙud, harom gardonid; Bigu: «agar rostgu hasted, pas, Tavrotro ʙijovaredu ʙixoned
